committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to repeal the Federal Reserve Act.

summary.text: Repeals the Federal Reserve Act one year after the date of the enactment of this Act. Directs the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to dispose of all assets of the Federal Reserve System and to terminate its affairs prior to the repeal of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the Federal Reserve Act.
